price: Maze babwirwe bati “Biri hehe ibyo mwajyaga mugaragira (ibigirwamana)
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lahum ayna mā kuntum tush'rikūna
